trustfund:
TF058084-EMERGENCY POWER SECTOR REFORM
            CAPACITY REINFORCEMENT PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Emergency Power
            Sector Reform Capacity Reinforcement Project for Lebanon is
            to accelerate the implementation of electricity sector
            reforms and restructuring of Electricite du Leban (EdL) by
            enhancing the capacity of Ministry of Environment and Waters
            (MOEW), EdL and the multi-ministry higher level committee.
            To date the project has funded three consulting contracts
            that have supported the Lebanese government with the
            capacity to implement reforms to the electricity sector.
            However, one of these consulting contracts has not been
            completed due to lack of political consensus around
            recommendations made by the consultants. The Government of
            Lebanon therefore intends to terminate this contract and
            using remaining project funds to fund further consulting
            services to support implementation of much needed
            electricity sector reforms. This restructuring paper
            proposes a second extension to the closing date of this
            project from December 31, 2010 to December 31, 2012 to allow
            the project to be completed and to meet its original project
            development objectives.
